title: AdS S-Matrix for Massive Vector Fields
authors:
Nabamita Banerjee, Amogh Neelkanth Desai, Karan Fernandes, Arpita
  Mitra, and Tabasum Rahnuma
abstract:
We generalize a recent ``AdS S-matrix" formulation for interacting massive
scalars on AdS spacetimes to the case of massive vector fields. This method
relies on taking the infinite radius limit for scattering processes
perturbatively, which is analyzed using Witten diagrams in the momentum space
formulation of global AdS with embedding space coordinates. It recovers the
S-matrix with subleading corrections in powers of the inverse AdS radius about
a flat spacetime region within the bulk. We first derive the massive vector
bulk-to-boundary and bulk-to-bulk propagators within this perturbation theory.
As an example, we consider the Abelian Higgs Model in a certain regime of the
coupling parameter space to model an interacting Proca theory on AdS
spacetimes. We specifically compute the AdS S-matrix for a process involving
massive external vector fields mediated by a massive scalar. We lastly discuss
possible massless limit of propagators within this perturbative framework.
